name: Zup! Arena
description: Zup! Arena is a multiplayer arcade game in which you have to fight with other players! Throw off all your opponents from the battlefield and become the "King of the mountain". Play alone or in a group with friends!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2400 Mhz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3000 Mhz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
